'''Rose''' was the youngest child of [[Holman the greenhanded]].

==History==
Rose married [[Cotman]] of [[Bywater]], and they had one child, [[Holman Cotton]], named after her father, [[Holman the greenhanded]].<ref>{{App|Gamgee}}</ref>
